passive.name: Damnation
passive.description: Thresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him, permanently granting him Armor and Ability Power.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Thresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him, permanently granting him Armor and Ability Power.

passive.name: Blood Well
passive.description: When using an ability that costs Health, Aatrox stores the self-inflicted damage into the Blood Well. Upon taking fatal damage, Aatrox extracts the blood from the well and recovers it as Health over a brief duration. Additionally, Aatrox gains 1% Attack Speed for every 2% blood that is in the well.
passive.sanitizedDescription: When using an ability that costs Health, Aatrox stores the self-inflicted damage into the Blood Well. Upon taking fatal damage, Aatrox extracts the blood from the well and recovers it as Health over a brief duration. Additionally, Aatrox gains 1% Attack Speed for every 2% blood that is in the well.

passive.name: Battle Fury
passive.description: Tryndamere gains Fury for each attack, critical strike, and killing blow he makes. Fury passively increases his Critical Strike Chance and can be consumed with his Bloodlust spell.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Tryndamere gains Fury for each attack, critical strike, and killing blow he makes. Fury passively increases his Critical Strike Chance and can be consumed with his Bloodlust spell.

passive.name: Happy Hour
passive.description: On ability use, Gragas takes a drink restoring 4% of his max Health. This effect can only happen every 8 seconds.
passive.sanitizedDescription: On ability use, Gragas takes a drink restoring 4% of his max Health. This effect can only happen every 8 seconds.

passive.name: Aspect of the Serpent
passive.description: Cassiopeia gains stacks of Aspect of the Serpent over time and by poisoning enemy champions.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Cassiopeia gains stacks of Aspect of the Serpent over time and by poisoning enemy champions.

passive.name: Arcane Mastery
passive.description:
Casting spells grants a stack of Arcane Mastery.

At 5 stacks, Ryze becomes supercharged, gaining a Mana shield that blocks damage and causing his spellcasts to reduce the cooldown of his other spells significantly.

Ryze's abilities scale with his maximum Mana.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Casting spells grants a stack of Arcane Mastery. At 5 stacks, Ryze becomes supercharged, gaining a Mana shield that blocks damage and causing his spellcasts to reduce the cooldown of his other spells significantly. Ryze's abilities scale with his maximum Mana.

passive.name: Iron Ambassador
passive.description:
Poppy throws her buckler, gaining range and bonus magic damage.

The buckler lands at a nearby location and Poppy can pick it up to gain a shield. Enemies can step on the buckler to destroy it.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Poppy throws her buckler, gaining range and bonus magic damage. The buckler lands at a nearby location and Poppy can pick it up to gain a shield. Enemies can step on the buckler to destroy it.

passive.name: Glory in Death
passive.description:
After being killed, Sion will reanimate himself with rapidly decaying Health.

He can move and attack during this time. He gains 100% Lifesteal, attacks extremely fast and will deal an additional 10% of his target's maximum Health as physical damage on hit. Max 75 bonus damage against monsters.

All of his abilities are replaced with Death Surge, which grants him a burst of Movement Speed.
passive.sanitizedDescription: After being killed, Sion will reanimate himself with rapidly decaying Health. He can move and attack during this time. He gains 100% Lifesteal, attacks extremely fast and will deal an additional 10% of his target's maximum Health as physical damage on hit. Max 75 bonus damage against monsters. All of his abilities are replaced with Death Surge, which grants him a burst of Movement Speed.

passive.name: Whisper
passive.description: Jhin's hand cannon, Whisper, is a precise instrument designed to deal superior damage. It fires at a fixed rate and carries only four shots. Jhin imbues the final bullet with dark magics to critically strike and deal bonus execute damage. Whenever Whisper crits, it inspires Jhin with a burst of movement speed.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Jhin's hand cannon, Whisper, is a precise instrument designed to deal superior damage. It fires at a fixed rate and carries only four shots. Jhin imbues the final bullet with dark magics to critically strike and deal bonus execute damage. Whenever Whisper crits, it inspires Jhin with a burst of movement speed.

passive.name: Pyromania
passive.description: After casting 4 spells, Annie's next offensive spell will stun the target for a short duration.
passive.sanitizedDescription: After casting 4 spells, Annie's next offensive spell will stun the target for a short duration.

passive.name: Staggering Blow
passive.description: Nautilus' basic attacks deal bonus physical damage and immobilize his targets. This effect cannot happen more than once every few seconds on the same target.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Nautilus' basic attacks deal bonus physical damage and immobilize his targets. This effect cannot happen more than once every few seconds on the same target.

passive.name: Gathering Fire
passive.description: Reduces Mantra's cooldown each time Karma damages an enemy champion with one of her abilities (Half-effect for Karma's basic attacks)
passive.sanitizedDescription: Reduces Mantra's cooldown each time Karma damages an enemy champion with one of her abilities (Half-effect for Karma's basic attacks)

passive.name: Illumination
passive.description: Lux's damaging spells charge the target with energy for 6 seconds. Lux's next attack ignites the energy, dealing bonus magic damage (depending on Lux's level) to the target.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Lux's damaging spells charge the target with energy for 6 seconds. Lux's next attack ignites the energy, dealing bonus magic damage (depending on Lux's level) to the target.

passive.name: Essence Theft
passive.description: Gains a charge of Essence Theft whenever a spell hits an enemy (max: 3 charges per spell). Upon reaching 9 charges, Ahri's next spell heals her whenever it hits an enemy.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Gains a charge of Essence Theft whenever a spell hits an enemy (max: 3 charges per spell). Upon reaching 9 charges, Ahri's next spell heals her whenever it hits an enemy.

passive.name: Berserker Rage
passive.description: For each 1% of Health missing, Olaf's Attack Speed is increased by 1%.
passive.sanitizedDescription: For each 1% of Health missing, Olaf's Attack Speed is increased by 1%.

passive.name: Glorious Evolution
passive.description: Viktor starts with the Prototype Hex Core that can be upgraded three times in the store to augment his abilities.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Viktor starts with the Prototype Hex Core that can be upgraded three times in the store to augment his abilities.

passive.name: Empowered Bulwark
passive.description: Increases Singed's Health by 25 for every 100 Mana he has.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Increases Singed's Health by 25 for every 100 Mana he has.

passive.name: Perseverance
passive.description: If Garen has not recently been struck by damage or enemy abilities, he regenerates a percentage of his maximum health each second. Minion damage does not stop Perseverance.
passive.sanitizedDescription: If Garen has not recently been struck by damage or enemy abilities, he regenerates a percentage of his maximum health each second. Minion damage does not stop Perseverance.

passive.name: Rebirth
passive.description: Upon dying, Anivia will revert into an egg. If the egg can survive for six seconds, she is gloriously reborn.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Upon dying, Anivia will revert into an egg. If the egg can survive for six seconds, she is gloriously reborn.

passive.name: Sap Magic
passive.description: Each time a spell is cast near Maokai he draws energy from it, gaining a charge of Magical Sap. When Maokai has 5 charges his next basic attack heals him for a percentage of his max Health.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Each time a spell is cast near Maokai he draws energy from it, gaining a charge of Magical Sap. When Maokai has 5 charges his next basic attack heals him for a percentage of his max Health.

passive.name: Iceborn
passive.description: Every 18 seconds Lissandra's next ability costs no Mana. This cooldown is reduced by 1 second whenever Lissandra impairs an enemy's movement with an ability (does not apply to movement-impairing effects from items).
passive.sanitizedDescription: Every 18 seconds Lissandra's next ability costs no Mana. This cooldown is reduced by 1 second whenever Lissandra impairs an enemy's movement with an ability (does not apply to movement-impairing effects from items).

passive.name: Soul Siphon
passive.description: Morgana has Spell Vamp, healing herself whenever she deals damage with her spells.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Morgana has Spell Vamp, healing herself whenever she deals damage with her spells.

passive.name: Nimble Fighter
passive.description: Fizz's dexterity allows him to move through units and take less physical damage from basic attacks.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Fizz's dexterity allows him to move through units and take less physical damage from basic attacks.

passive.name: Shadow Walk
passive.description: When out of combat, Evelynn enters stealth only being able to be seen by nearby enemy champions or true sight. While stealthed, she rapidly regenerates Mana.
passive.sanitizedDescription: When out of combat, Evelynn enters stealth only being able to be seen by nearby enemy champions or true sight. While stealthed, she rapidly regenerates Mana.

passive.name: Contempt for the Weak
passive.description: Zed's basic attacks against targets below 50% Health deal 6-10% of the target's maximum Health as bonus Magic Damage. This effect can only occur once every 10 seconds on the same target.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Zed's basic attacks against targets below 50% Health deal 6-10% of the target's maximum Health as bonus Magic Damage. This effect can only occur once every 10 seconds on the same target.

passive.name: Techmaturgical Repair Bots
passive.description: Heimerdinger gives nearby allied H-28G Turrets and Champions increased Health Regeneration.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Heimerdinger gives nearby allied H-28G Turrets and Champions increased Health Regeneration.

passive.name: Junkyard Titan
passive.description: Every spell Rumble casts gives him Heat. When he reaches 50% Heat he reaches Danger Zone, granting all his basic abilities bonus effects. When he reaches 100% Heat, he starts Overheating, granting his basic attacks bonus damage, but making him unable to cast spells for a few seconds.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Every spell Rumble casts gives him Heat. When he reaches 50% Heat he reaches Danger Zone, granting all his basic abilities bonus effects. When he reaches 100% Heat, he starts Overheating, granting his basic attacks bonus damage, but making him unable to cast spells for a few seconds.

passive.name: Power Chord
passive.description: After casting 3 spells, Sona's next attack deals bonus magic damage in addition to a bonus effect depending on what song Sona last activated.
passive.sanitizedDescription: After casting 3 spells, Sona's next attack deals bonus magic damage in addition to a bonus effect depending on what song Sona last activated.

passive.name: Iron Man
passive.description: A percent of the damage dealt from abilities is converted into a temporary shield, absorbing incoming damage.
passive.sanitizedDescription: A percent of the damage dealt from abilities is converted into a temporary shield, absorbing incoming damage.

passive.name: Icathian Surprise
passive.description: Upon dying, Kog'Maw starts a chain reaction in his body which causes him to move faster and detonate after 4 seconds; dealing 100 + (25 x lvl) true damage to surrounding enemies.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Upon dying, Kog'Maw starts a chain reaction in his body which causes him to move faster and detonate after 4 seconds; dealing 100 + (25 x lvl) true damage to surrounding enemies.

passive.name: Voracity
passive.description: Katarina's spell cooldowns are reduced by 15 seconds whenever a champion that she has damaged in the last 3 seconds dies.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Katarina's spell cooldowns are reduced by 15 seconds whenever a champion that she has damaged in the last 3 seconds dies.

passive.name: Pix, Faerie Companion
passive.description: Pix is a wild Faerie that accompanies Lulu. Pix will fire a barrage of magical energy at targets that Lulu attacks.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Pix is a wild Faerie that accompanies Lulu. Pix will fire a barrage of magical energy at targets that Lulu attacks.

passive.name: Frost Shot
passive.description:
Ashe's attacks slow their target, causing her to deal increased damage to these targets.

Ashe's critical strikes deal no bonus damage but apply an empowered slow to the target.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Ashe's attacks slow their target, causing her to deal increased damage to these targets. Ashe's critical strikes deal no bonus damage but apply an empowered slow to the target.

passive.name: Death Defied
passive.description: Upon dying, Karthus enters a spirit form that allows him to continue casting spells while dead for 7 seconds.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Upon dying, Karthus enters a spirit form that allows him to continue casting spells while dead for 7 seconds.

passive.name: Trample
passive.description: Each time Alistar casts a spell, he tramples nearby units and turrets for a few seconds, dealing damage to units he walks over.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Each time Alistar casts a spell, he tramples nearby units and turrets for a few seconds, dealing damage to units he walks over.

passive.name: Hemorrhage
passive.description: Darius aims his attacks strategically, causing his target to bleed. This effect stacks up to five times. Enemies that reach max Hemorrhage cause Darius to gain Noxian Might, greatly increasing his damage.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Darius aims his attacks strategically, causing his target to bleed. This effect stacks up to five times. Enemies that reach max Hemorrhage cause Darius to gain Noxian Might, greatly increasing his damage.

passive.name: Night Hunter
passive.description: Vayne ruthlessly hunts evil-doers. She gains 30 Movement Speed when moving toward nearby enemy champions.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Vayne ruthlessly hunts evil-doers. She gains 30 Movement Speed when moving toward nearby enemy champions.

passive.name: Living Vengeance
passive.description: On kill or assist, Varus temporarily gains Attack Speed. This bonus is larger if the enemy is a champion.
passive.sanitizedDescription: On kill or assist, Varus temporarily gains Attack Speed. This bonus is larger if the enemy is a champion.

passive.name: Monkey's Agility
passive.description: Entering a stance grants Udyr 10% Attack Speed and 5 Movement Speed for a short duration. This effect can stack up to 3 times.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Entering a stance grants Udyr 10% Attack Speed and 5 Movement Speed for a short duration. This effect can stack up to 3 times.

passive.name: Sunlight
passive.description: Damaging spells afflict enemies with Sunlight for 3.5 seconds. When allied Champions deal damage to those targets, they consume the Sunlight debuff to deal additional magic damage.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Damaging spells afflict enemies with Sunlight for 3.5 seconds. When allied Champions deal damage to those targets, they consume the Sunlight debuff to deal additional magic damage.

passive.name: Hextech Capacitor
passive.description: Gains 40 Movement Speed for 1.25 seconds and can move through units each time Transform is cast.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Gains 40 Movement Speed for 1.25 seconds and can move through units each time Transform is cast.

passive.name: Transcendent
passive.description:
Spells gain extra effects at max rank.

Dark Sphere: Deals 15% bonus damage to champions.
Force of Will: Increases the slowing duration by 33%.
Scatter the Weak: Spell width increased by 50%.
Unleashed Power: Range increased by 75.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Spells gain extra effects at max rank. Dark Sphere: Deals 15% bonus damage to champions. Force of Will: Increases the slowing duration by 33%. Scatter the Weak: Spell width increased by 50%. Unleashed Power: Range increased by 75.

passive.name: Aegis Protection
passive.description: After attacking or casting spells 4 times, Pantheon will block the next incoming basic attack or turret attack.
passive.sanitizedDescription: After attacking or casting spells 4 times, Pantheon will block the next incoming basic attack or turret attack.

passive.name: Runic Blade
passive.description: Riven's abilities charge her blade, causing her basic attacks to deal bonus physical damage. Riven's blade may be charged up to three times and expends one charge per attack.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Riven's abilities charge her blade, causing her basic attacks to deal bonus physical damage. Riven's blade may be charged up to three times and expends one charge per attack.

passive.name: Unseen Threat
passive.description: When Kha'Zix is not visible to the enemy team, he gains Unseen Threat, causing his next basic attack against an enemy Champion to deal bonus magic damage and slow.
passive.sanitizedDescription: When Kha'Zix is not visible to the enemy team, he gains Unseen Threat, causing his next basic attack against an enemy Champion to deal bonus magic damage and slow.

passive.name: Hextech Munitions
passive.description: Corki's basic attack deals bonus damage and half of its damage is converted into magic damage. Every once in a while, The Package arrives in Corki's base to be picked up, temporarily granting him out of combat Movement Speed and upgrading Valkyrie into Special Delivery.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Corki's basic attack deals bonus damage and half of its damage is converted into magic damage. Every once in a while, The Package arrives in Corki's base to be picked up, temporarily granting him out of combat Movement Speed and upgrading Valkyrie into Special Delivery.

passive.name: Headshot
passive.description: Every few basic attacks, or against a target she has trapped or netted, Caitlyn will fire a headshot dealing bonus damage that scales with her critical strike chance. On trapped or netted targets, Caitlyn's Headshot attack range is doubled.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Every few basic attacks, or against a target she has trapped or netted, Caitlyn will fire a headshot dealing bonus damage that scales with her critical strike chance. On trapped or netted targets, Caitlyn's Headshot attack range is doubled.

passive.name: Shurima's Legacy
passive.description: Azir can summon the Disc of the Sun from the ruins of allied or enemy turrets.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Azir can summon the Disc of the Sun from the ruins of allied or enemy turrets.

passive.name: Prowl
passive.description:
Moving through brush increases Nidalee's Movement Speed by 10% for 2 seconds, increased to 30% toward visible enemy champions within 5500 range.

Hitting champions or monsters with Javelin Toss and Bushwhack triggers a Hunt, revealing them for 4 seconds. During this time, Nidalee gains 10% Movement Speed (increased to 30% toward the Hunted target) and her first Takedown and Pounce are enhanced against them.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Moving through brush increases Nidalee's Movement Speed by 10% for 2 seconds, increased to 30% toward visible enemy champions within 5500 range. Hitting champions or monsters with Javelin Toss and Bushwhack triggers a Hunt, revealing them for 4 seconds. During this time, Nidalee gains 10% Movement Speed (increased to 30% toward the Hunted target) and her first Takedown and Pounce are enhanced against them.

passive.name: Mark of the Storm
passive.description:
Kennen's abilities add a Mark of the Storm to its target for 6.25 seconds. Upon receiving 3 Marks of the Storm, an opponent is stunned for 1.25 seconds and Kennen gains 25 Energy.

The stun has a diminished effect if it occurs again within 7 seconds.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Kennen's abilities add a Mark of the Storm to its target for 6.25 seconds. Upon receiving 3 Marks of the Storm, an opponent is stunned for 1.25 seconds and Kennen gains 25 Energy. The stun has a diminished effect if it occurs again within 7 seconds.

passive.name: Runic Skin
passive.description: Galio converts 50% of his total Magic Resistance into Ability Power.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Galio converts 50% of his total Magic Resistance into Ability Power.

passive.name: Equilibrium
passive.description: Veigar's Mana Regen is increased by 1.5% for each 1% of Mana missing.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Veigar's Mana Regen is increased by 1.5% for each 1% of Mana missing.

passive.name: Traveler's Call
passive.description: Bard's presence causes magical chimes to appear, which grant Bard experience, mana, and a burst of speed. Additionally, lesser spirits follow Bard and aid in his attacks - collecting chimes causes these meeps to gain power over the course of the game.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Bard's presence causes magical chimes to appear, which grant Bard experience, mana, and a burst of speed. Additionally, lesser spirits follow Bard and aid in his attacks - collecting chimes causes these meeps to gain power over the course of the game.

passive.name: Rage Gene
passive.description: While in combat Gnar generates Rage. At maximum Rage his next ability will transform him into Mega Gnar, granting increased survivability and access to new spells.
passive.sanitizedDescription: While in combat Gnar generates Rage. At maximum Rage his next ability will transform him into Mega Gnar, granting increased survivability and access to new spells.

passive.name: Summon Voidling
passive.description:
After casting 4 spells, Malzahar summons an uncontrollable Voidling to engage enemy units for 21 seconds. Voidlings have 200 + 50 x lvl Health and 20 + 5 x lvl Attack Damage.

Voidlings Grow after 7 seconds (+50% Attack Damage/Armor), and Frenzy after 14 seconds (+100% Attack Speed).
passive.sanitizedDescription: After casting 4 spells, Malzahar summons an uncontrollable Voidling to engage enemy units for 21 seconds. Voidlings have 200 + 50 x lvl Health and 20 + 5 x lvl Attack Damage. Voidlings Grow after 7 seconds (+50% Attack Damage/Armor), and Frenzy after 14 seconds (+100% Attack Speed).

passive.name: New Destiny
passive.description: Graves's shotgun holds two shells. After firing them he must reload. Each attack fires several bullets in a cone. Hitting an enemy with multiple bullets does bonus damage. These bullets cannot pass through units.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Graves's shotgun holds two shells. After firing them he must reload. Each attack fires several bullets in a cone. Hitting an enemy with multiple bullets does bonus damage. These bullets cannot pass through units.

passive.name: Blast Shield
passive.description: Vi charges a shield over time. The shield can be activated by hitting an enemy with an ability.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Vi charges a shield over time. The shield can be activated by hitting an enemy with an ability.

passive.name: Holy Fervor
passive.description: When Kayle attacks a champion, the target loses 3% Armor and Magic Resistance for 5 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.
passive.sanitizedDescription: When Kayle attacks a champion, the target loses 3% Armor and Magic Resistance for 5 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

passive.name: Ionian Fervor
passive.description:
Reduces the duration of all disables for each nearby enemy champion.

1 Champion: 10%
2 Champions: 25%
3 Champions: 40%
passive.sanitizedDescription: Reduces the duration of all disables for each nearby enemy champion. 1 Champion: 10% 2 Champions: 25% 3 Champions: 40%

passive.name: Flurry
passive.description: After Lee Sin uses an ability, his next 2 basic attacks gain 40% Attack Speed and return 20/10 Energy.
passive.sanitizedDescription: After Lee Sin uses an ability, his next 2 basic attacks gain 40% Attack Speed and return 20/10 Energy.

passive.name: Prophet of an Elder God
passive.description: Illaoi and theVessels she creates spawn Tentacles on nearby impassible terrain. Tentacles swing at Spirits, Vessels, and victims of Illaoi's Harsh lesson. Tentacles deal physical damage to enemies hit.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Illaoi and theVessels she creates spawn Tentacles on nearby impassible terrain. Tentacles swing at Spirits, Vessels, and victims of Illaoi's Harsh lesson. Tentacles deal physical damage to enemies hit.

passive.name: Spider Queen
passive.description:
Human Form: When Elise's mage abilities hit an enemy, she gains a dormant Spiderling.

Spider Form: Basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and restore health to Elise.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Human Form: When Elise's mage abilities hit an enemy, she gains a dormant Spiderling. Spider Form: Basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and restore health to Elise.

passive.name: Chosen of the Storm
passive.description: Volibear heals rapidly for a few seconds when his Health drops to a critical level.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Volibear heals rapidly for a few seconds when his Health drops to a critical level.

passive.name: Visionary
passive.description: Nunu can cast a spell for free after 5 attacks.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Nunu can cast a spell for free after 5 attacks.

passive.name: Loaded Dice
passive.description: Upon killing a unit, Twisted Fate rolls his 'lucky' dice receiving anywhere between 1 and 6 bonus gold.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Upon killing a unit, Twisted Fate rolls his 'lucky' dice receiving anywhere between 1 and 6 bonus gold.

passive.name: Relentless Assault
passive.description: Jax's consecutive basic attacks continuously increase his Attack Speed.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Jax's consecutive basic attacks continuously increase his Attack Speed.

passive.name: Dragonborn
passive.description: <mainText>Shyvana gains bonus Armor and Magic Resistance. These bonuses are doubled while Shyvana is in Dragon Form.</mainText>
passive.sanitizedDescription: Shyvana gains bonus Armor and Magic Resistance. These bonuses are doubled while Shyvana is in Dragon Form.

passive.name: Martial Poise
passive.description: Enter a movement command while winding up Kalista's basic attack or Pierce to lunge a short distance when she launches her attack.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Enter a movement command while winding up Kalista's basic attack or Pierce to lunge a short distance when she launches her attack.

passive.name: Adrenaline Rush
passive.description: Dr. Mundo regenerates 0.3% of his maximum Health each second.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Dr. Mundo regenerates 0.3% of his maximum Health each second.

passive.name: An Acquired Taste
passive.description: By damaging enemy champions with basic attacks and abilities, Tahm Kench builds stacks of An Acquired Taste on them. At three stacks, he can use Devour on an enemy champion.
passive.sanitizedDescription: By damaging enemy champions with basic attacks and abilities, Tahm Kench builds stacks of An Acquired Taste on them. At three stacks, he can use Devour on an enemy champion.

passive.name: Moonsilver Blade
passive.description: Gains Attack Speed. Every third strike cleaves nearby enemies for additional magic damage.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Gains Attack Speed. Every third strike cleaves nearby enemies for additional magic damage.

passive.name: Blaze
passive.description: Brand's spells light his targets ablaze, dealing 8% of their maximum Health in magic damage over 4 seconds.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Brand's spells light his targets ablaze, dealing 8% of their maximum Health in magic damage over 4 seconds.

passive.name: Frost
passive.description: Damaging an enemy with an ability or basic attack grants Sejuani bonus Armor and reduces movement-slowing effects on her.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Damaging an enemy with an ability or basic attack grants Sejuani bonus Armor and reduces movement-slowing effects on her.

passive.name: Crimson Pact
passive.description: Every 40 points of bonus Health gives Vladimir 1 Ability Power and every 1 point of Ability Power gives Vladimir 1.4 bonus Health (does not stack with itself).
passive.sanitizedDescription: Every 40 points of bonus Health gives Vladimir 1 Ability Power and every 1 point of Ability Power gives Vladimir 1.4 bonus Health (does not stack with itself).

passive.name: Cell Division
passive.description: Each time Zac hits an enemy with an ability, he sheds a chunk of himself that can be reabsorbed to restore Health. Upon taking fatal damage, Zac splits into 4 bloblets that attempt to recombine. If any bloblets remain after 8 seconds, he will revive with an amount of Health depending on the Health of the surviving bloblets. Each bloblet has a percentage of Zac's maximum Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. This ability has a 5 minute cooldown.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Each time Zac hits an enemy with an ability, he sheds a chunk of himself that can be reabsorbed to restore Health. Upon taking fatal damage, Zac splits into 4 bloblets that attempt to recombine. If any bloblets remain after 8 seconds, he will revive with an amount of Health depending on the Health of the surviving bloblets. Each bloblet has a percentage of Zac's maximum Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. This ability has a 5 minute cooldown.

passive.name: Fury of the Xer'Sai
passive.description: While unburrowed Rek'Sai generates Fury with her basic attacks and spells. When burrowed Rek'Sai consumes Fury to heal herself.
passive.sanitizedDescription: While unburrowed Rek'Sai generates Fury with her basic attacks and spells. When burrowed Rek'Sai consumes Fury to heal herself.

passive.name: Harrier
passive.description: Valor periodically marks enemies as Vulnerable. Quinn's first basic attack against Vulnerable targets will deal bonus physical damage.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Valor periodically marks enemies as Vulnerable. Quinn's first basic attack against Vulnerable targets will deal bonus physical damage.

passive.name: Twin Disciplines
passive.description:
Discipline of Force: Akali's basic attacks deal an additional 6% bonus Magic Damage, increasing by 1% for every 6 Ability Power.

Discipline of Might: Akali gains 6% Spell Vamp, increasing by 1% for every 6 Bonus Attack Damage.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Discipline of Force: Akali's basic attacks deal an additional 6% bonus Magic Damage, increasing by 1% for every 6 Ability Power. Discipline of Might: Akali gains 6% Spell Vamp, increasing by 1% for every 6 Bonus Attack Damage.

passive.name: Draw a Bead
passive.description: Increases Tristana's Attack Range as she levels.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Increases Tristana's Attack Range as she levels.

passive.name: Warpath
passive.description: Hecarim gains Attack Damage equal to a percentage of his bonus Movement Speed.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Hecarim gains Attack Damage equal to a percentage of his bonus Movement Speed.

passive.name: Fleet of Foot
passive.description: Sivir gains a short burst of Movement Speed when she attacks an enemy champion.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Sivir gains a short burst of Movement Speed when she attacks an enemy champion.

passive.name: Lightslinger
passive.description: Whenever Lucian uses an ability, his next attack becomes a double-shot.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Whenever Lucian uses an ability, his next attack becomes a double-shot.

passive.name: Unseen Predator
passive.description:
While in brush or stealth Rengar will leap at the target when using his basic attack.

Rengar builds 1 point of Ferocity with each ability he uses on enemies. When reaching 5 points of Ferocity, Rengar's next ability becomes empowered, granting it a bonus effect.
passive.sanitizedDescription: While in brush or stealth Rengar will leap at the target when using his basic attack. Rengar builds 1 point of Ferocity with each ability he uses on enemies. When reaching 5 points of Ferocity, Rengar's next ability becomes empowered, granting it a bonus effect.

passive.name: Eternal Thirst
passive.description: Each of Warwick's attacks will heal him. Each successive attack against the same target will steal more and more Health.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Each of Warwick's attacks will heal him. Each successive attack against the same target will steal more and more Health.

passive.name: Crystal Spires
passive.description: Skarner's presence causes crystals to spawn in set locations around the map. While near crystals his team owns, Skarner gains tremendous movement speed, attack speed, and mana regeneration.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Skarner's presence causes crystals to spawn in set locations around the map. While near crystals his team owns, Skarner gains tremendous movement speed, attack speed, and mana regeneration.

passive.name: Granite Shield
passive.description: Malphite is shielded by a layer of rock which absorbs damage up to 10% of his maximum Health. If Malphite has not been hit for 10 seconds, this effect recharges.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Malphite is shielded by a layer of rock which absorbs damage up to 10% of his maximum Health. If Malphite has not been hit for 10 seconds, this effect recharges.

passive.name: Way of the Wanderer
passive.description: Yasuo's Critical Strike Chance is doubled. Additionally, Yasuo builds toward a shield whenever he is moving. The shield triggers when he takes damage from a champion or monster.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Yasuo's Critical Strike Chance is doubled. Additionally, Yasuo builds toward a shield whenever he is moving. The shield triggers when he takes damage from a champion or monster.

passive.name: Mana Surge
passive.description: Xerath's basic attacks periodically restore Mana.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Xerath's basic attacks periodically restore Mana.

passive.name: Camouflage
passive.description: If Teemo stands still and takes no actions for a short duration, he becomes stealthed indefinitely. Teemo becomes stealthed twice as fast while in brush and can move around in brush without breaking his stealth. After leaving stealth, Teemo gains the Element of Surprise, increasing his Attack Speed for 3 seconds.
passive.sanitizedDescription: If Teemo stands still and takes no actions for a short duration, he becomes stealthed indefinitely. Teemo becomes stealthed twice as fast while in brush and can move around in brush without breaking his stealth. After leaving stealth, Teemo gains the Element of Surprise, increasing his Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

passive.name: Reign of Anger
passive.description: Renekton gains Fury for every autoattack he makes. This Fury can empower his abilities with bonus effects. Additionally, Renekton gains bonus Fury when he is low on life.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Renekton gains Fury for every autoattack he makes. This Fury can empower his abilities with bonus effects. Additionally, Renekton gains bonus Fury when he is low on life.

passive.name: Soul Eater
passive.description: Nasus drains his foe's spiritual energy, giving him bonus Life Steal.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Nasus drains his foe's spiritual energy, giving him bonus Life Steal.

passive.name: League of Draven
passive.description: Draven gains his fans' Adoration when he catches a Spinning Axe or kills a minion, monster, or tower. Killing enemy champions grants Draven bonus gold based on how much Adoration he has.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Draven gains his fans' Adoration when he catches a Spinning Axe or kills a minion, monster, or tower. Killing enemy champions grants Draven bonus gold based on how much Adoration he has.

passive.name: Backstab
passive.description: Shaco deals 20% bonus damage when striking a unit from behind.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Shaco deals 20% bonus damage when striking a unit from behind.

passive.name: Carrion Renewal
passive.description: Swain regenerates Mana each time he kills a unit. This amount increases each level.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Swain regenerates Mana each time he kills a unit. This amount increases each level.

passive.name: Short Fuse
passive.description: Every 12 seconds, Ziggs' next basic attack deals bonus magic damage. This cooldown is reduced whenever Ziggs uses an ability.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Every 12 seconds, Ziggs' next basic attack deals bonus magic damage. This cooldown is reduced whenever Ziggs uses an ability.

passive.name: Mercy
passive.description: Talon deals 10% more damage with his basic attacks to any target that is slowed, stunned, immobilized, or suppressed.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Talon deals 10% more damage with his basic attacks to any target that is slowed, stunned, immobilized, or suppressed.

passive.name: Tailwind
passive.description: Increases the Movement Speed of all allied champions moving towards Janna by 8%.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Increases the Movement Speed of all allied champions moving towards Janna by 8%.

passive.name: Z-Drive Resonance
passive.description: Ekko's Zero-Drive charges his spells and attacks with temporal energy. The third hit deals bonus damage and saps the target's movement speed. If the target is a champion, Ekko gains accelerated movement speed.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Ekko's Zero-Drive charges his spells and attacks with temporal energy. The third hit deals bonus damage and saps the target's movement speed. If the target is a champion, Ekko gains accelerated movement speed.

passive.name: Clockwork Windup
passive.description: Orianna's autoattack deals additional magic damage. This damage increases the more Orianna attacks the same target.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Orianna's autoattack deals additional magic damage. This damage increases the more Orianna attacks the same target.

passive.name: Duelist's Dance
passive.description: Fiora challenges nearby enemy Champions to dodge her. She calls out a direction from which she will try to strike. If she can complete her own challenge, she receives a small bonus and calls out a new direction.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Fiora challenges nearby enemy Champions to dodge her. She calls out a direction from which she will try to strike. If she can complete her own challenge, she receives a small bonus and calls out a new direction.

passive.name: Dread
passive.description: Fiddlesticks' spells reduce the Magic Resist of his targets.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Fiddlesticks' spells reduce the Magic Resist of his targets.

passive.name: Spiked Shell
passive.description: Rammus gains additional damage as his shell becomes reinforced, converting 25% of his Armor into Attack Damage.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Rammus gains additional damage as his shell becomes reinforced, converting 25% of his Armor into Attack Damage.

passive.name: Carnivore
passive.description: Whenever Cho'Gath kills a unit, he recovers Health and Mana. The values restored increase with Cho'Gath's level.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Whenever Cho'Gath kills a unit, he recovers Health and Mana. The values restored increase with Cho'Gath's level.

passive.name: Mirror Image
passive.description:
When LeBlanc drops below 40% Health, she becomes invisible for 1 second and creates a Mirror Image that deals no damage and lasts for up to 8 seconds.

Mirror Image has a 1 minute cooldown.

Mirror Image can be controlled by holding the Alt key and using the right mouse button.
passive.sanitizedDescription: When LeBlanc drops below 40% Health, she becomes invisible for 1 second and creates a Mirror Image that deals no damage and lasts for up to 8 seconds. Mirror Image has a 1 minute cooldown. Mirror Image can be controlled by holding the Alt key and using the right mouse button.

passive.name: Time in a Bottle
passive.description:
Zilean stores time as Experience.

When he has enough Experience to finish an ally's level, he can right-click them to impart it. Zilean receives as much Experience as he gives. Cannot be used in combat.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Zilean stores time as Experience. When he has enough Experience to finish an ally's level, he can right-click them to impart it. Zilean receives as much Experience as he gives. Cannot be used in combat.

passive.name: Salvation
passive.description: Soraka runs faster towards nearby low health allies.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Soraka runs faster towards nearby low health allies.

passive.name: Umbra Blades
passive.description:
Every 10 seconds, Nocturne's next attack strikes surrounding enemies for 120% physical damage and heals himself.

Nocturne's basic attacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Every 10 seconds, Nocturne's next attack strikes surrounding enemies for 120% physical damage and heals himself. Nocturne's basic attacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second.

passive.name: Get Excited!
passive.description: Jinx receives massively increased Movement Speed and stacking Attack Speed whenever she damages an enemy champion, tower, or inhibitor that is then killed or destroyed within 3 seconds.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Jinx receives massively increased Movement Speed and stacking Attack Speed whenever she damages an enemy champion, tower, or inhibitor that is then killed or destroyed within 3 seconds.

passive.name: Unholy Covenant
passive.description: Yorick takes 5% reduced damage and his basic attacks deal 5% more damage for each summon that is active. Meanwhile, Yorick's ghouls have 35% of Yorick's Attack Damage and Health.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Yorick takes 5% reduced damage and his basic attacks deal 5% more damage for each summon that is active. Meanwhile, Yorick's ghouls have 35% of Yorick's Attack Damage and Health.

passive.name: Zaun-Touched Bolt Augmenter
passive.description: Urgot's basic attacks and Acid Hunters reduce his targets' damage by 15% for 2.5 seconds.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Urgot's basic attacks and Acid Hunters reduce his targets' damage by 15% for 2.5 seconds.

passive.name: Mark of the Kindred
passive.description: Kindred can mark targets to Hunt. Successfully completing a Hunt permanently empowers Kindred's basic attacks.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Kindred can mark targets to Hunt. Successfully completing a Hunt permanently empowers Kindred's basic attacks.

passive.name: Love Tap
passive.description: Miss Fortune deals bonus physical damage whenever she attacks a new target.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Miss Fortune deals bonus physical damage whenever she attacks a new target.

passive.name: Stone Skin
passive.description: Increases Wukong's Armor and Magic Resistance for each nearby enemy champion.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Increases Wukong's Armor and Magic Resistance for each nearby enemy champion.

passive.name: Mana Barrier
passive.description: When Blitzcrank's life is brought below 20% health, he activates Mana Barrier. This creates a mana shield equal to 50% of his mana for 10 seconds. Mana Barrier can only occur once every 90 seconds.
passive.sanitizedDescription: When Blitzcrank's life is brought below 20% health, he activates Mana Barrier. This creates a mana shield equal to 50% of his mana for 10 seconds. Mana Barrier can only occur once every 90 seconds.

passive.name: Ki Barrier
passive.description: After casting a spell, Shen gets a shield. Affecting other champions reduces the cooldown of this effect.
passive.sanitizedDescription: After casting a spell, Shen gets a shield. Affecting other champions reduces the cooldown of this effect.

passive.name: Concussive Blows
passive.description: Braum adds stacks of Concussive Blows to enemies with basic attacks or Winter's Bite. He and his allies continue to add stacks with basic attacks, at 4 stacks their target will be stunned.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Braum adds stacks of Concussive Blows to enemies with basic attacks or Winter's Bite. He and his allies continue to add stacks with basic attacks, at 4 stacks their target will be stunned.

passive.name: Challenge
passive.description: Xin Zhao challenges his target with his basic attacks and Audacious Charge, reducing its Armor by 15% for 3 seconds.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Xin Zhao challenges his target with his basic attacks and Audacious Charge, reducing its Armor by 15% for 3 seconds.

passive.name: Deadly Venom
passive.description: Twitch's basic attacks infect the target, dealing true damage each second.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Twitch's basic attacks infect the target, dealing true damage each second.

passive.name: Double Strike
passive.description: Every few strikes, Master Yi strikes twice.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Every few strikes, Master Yi strikes twice.

passive.name: Gemcraft
passive.description: After casting a spell, Taric's next basic attack deals bonus magic damage based on his Armor and reduces his cooldowns.
passive.sanitizedDescription: After casting a spell, Taric's next basic attack deals bonus magic damage based on his Armor and reduces his cooldowns.

passive.name: Cursed Touch
passive.description: Amumu's attacks reduce the target's Magic Resistance for a short duration.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Amumu's attacks reduce the target's Magic Resistance for a short duration.

passive.name: Trial by Fire
passive.description: Every few seconds, Gangplank's melee strike will set his opponent on fire.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Every few seconds, Gangplank's melee strike will set his opponent on fire.

passive.name: King's Tribute
passive.description: When an enemy unit dies near Trundle, he heals for a percent of its maximum Health.
passive.sanitizedDescription: When an enemy unit dies near Trundle, he heals for a percent of its maximum Health.

passive.name: Void Stone
passive.description: Kassadin takes 15% reduced magic damage and ignores unit collision.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Kassadin takes 15% reduced magic damage and ignores unit collision.

passive.name: Organic Deconstruction
passive.description: Vel'Koz's spells build Organic Deconstruction stacks on enemies. The third spell hit consumes the stacks and deals bonus true damage.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Vel'Koz's spells build Organic Deconstruction stacks on enemies. The third spell hit consumes the stacks and deals bonus true damage.

passive.name: Rise of the Thorns
passive.description: When Zyra dies, she briefly returns to her plant form. After 2 seconds, she can press any ability to fire a thorn toward her cursor, dealing true damage to each enemy it strikes.
passive.sanitizedDescription: When Zyra dies, she briefly returns to her plant form. After 2 seconds, she can press any ability to fire a thorn toward her cursor, dealing true damage to each enemy it strikes.

passive.name: Surging Tides
passive.description: When Nami's abilities hit allied champions they gain Movement Speed for a short duration.
passive.sanitizedDescription: When Nami's abilities hit allied champions they gain Movement Speed for a short duration.

passive.name: Martial Cadence
passive.description: Jarvan IV's initial basic attack on a target deals bonus physical damage. This effect cannot occur again on the same target for a short duration.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Jarvan IV's initial basic attack on a target deals bonus physical damage. This effect cannot occur again on the same target for a short duration.

passive.name: Rising Spell Force
passive.description: Hitting a target with any of Ezreal's abilities increases his Attack Speed by 10% for 6 seconds (effect stacks up to 5 times).
passive.sanitizedDescription: Hitting a target with any of Ezreal's abilities increases his Attack Speed by 10% for 6 seconds (effect stacks up to 5 times).
